name: Meowchief
description:
The family left for their summer vacation and you are the one in charge.  As a cat you just can't help yourself but push all of these house objects off of the shelves and walls!

Drop as many objects as possible, but don't forget to be quick! Purchase special cheat power-ups from the shop and blaze through the levels like a leopard.

This game was made in a week for the 142nd Weekly Game Jam by Cez and Sko0owi.

Good luck and have fun!
